Please watch the video until you understand the story. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aph1JPFkeXc The spelling test for next Friday is: nature patterns repeat sequence symmetry backyard twig arranged sets series rainbow seasons cocoon snowflakes beautiful Complete all your AR reading quizzes for your library books! Go to www.readworks.org/student Enter our class code YU6GQ2 Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it Math Complete Additional Practice 4-9 Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills. Language Arts Complete pages 62-63 in the Vocabulary workshop book. ğŸ“š Weekend Journal Reminder Hi everyone! ğŸ˜Š As you work on your weekend journals, please take a moment to think carefully about your structure, grammar, and content. Here are some tips to help you write a strong entry: Focus on one interesting event from your weekend. Donâ€™t try to write about everythingâ€”choose something that really stands out to you. Use past tense since you are writing about something that already happened. Include a clear opening (introduce your event) and a closing statement (wrap up your thoughts or feelings about it). Make it interesting for the reader! Share details, your feelings, or something funny or surprising. Take your time and write thoughtfully.
